tag_list: adam-willhoeft, digital-strategist, digital-media-strategist, digital-media-marketing-consultant, social-media-consultant, online-reputation-consultant, online-marketing-consultant, digital-marketing-director
overview:
Adam Willhoeft is a digital media marketing consultant, social media strategist and an online reputation specialist. He works with C-level executives to plan, design, build and manage successful digital strategies. His outside-the-box approach delivers innovation and results to the clients he works for.

• 7 yrs. experience, with specific to digital/social media strategies and digital media buying • 4 yrs. experience in a project manager role • Bought and optimized over $25,000,000+ in ad inventory for online campaigns • Managed annual advertising budgets over $12,000,000+ • Performance Driven – it all comes down to ROI • Strong ability to influence key stakeholders and related decisions • Ability to lead, work autonomously and collaboratively in a fast-paced team environment delivering top quality results with a positive demeanor • Strong history in managing client relationships and expectations • Adapts to change quickly
